title: Simple Mac and Cheese Recipe
description: This creamy bake of macaroni and cheese is assembled with almost effortless ease by combining cooked macaroni with cream of mushroom soup, milk and shredded cheese. Pop it into a hot oven and get ready to eat!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Main Dishes Pasta Macaroni and Cheese Recipes Baked Macaroni and Cheese Recipes Simple Mac and Cheese 4.1 (120) 98 Reviews 13 Photos Super simple macaroni and cheese to make without having to make a white sauce! I have a casserole setting on my microwave and use that. Takes only 20 minutes. Submitted by Sue Bennett Updated on October 11, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 13 13 13 13 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 40 mins Total Time: 50 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup (such as Campbell’s) 1 ¼ cups milk ½ cup shredded Cheddar cheese 1 ½ cups macaroni Directions Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Mix together condensed soup and cheese. Using the empty soup can, measure 1 can of milk; mix into the soup mixture. Stir in cooked pasta. Dump into a greased casserole dish, and cover. Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) until hot and bubbly, about 30 minutes. I Made It Print 181 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 270 Calories 12g Fat 27g Carbs 12g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 270 % Daily Value * Total Fat 12g 16% Saturated Fat 5g 27% Cholesterol 26mg 9% Sodium 691mg 30% Total Carbohydrate 27g 10% Dietary Fiber 1g 5% Total Sugars 9g Protein 12g 24% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 302mg 23% Iron 1mg 4% Potassium 300mg 6% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Simple Mac and Cheese 01 of 13 Photo by  France C 02 of 13 Photo by  France C 09/30/2024 Needs improvement The flavor was lacking; it could definitely use more seasonings, even just garlic or onion powder, and some salt in the very least. The cook time is also way too long; all the liquid ends up cooking out of the dish. I had to add some milk before serving to loosen things up a bit. I also prefer making a cheese sauce instead of just throwing shredded cheese into the macaroni - it doesn't melt in very well, even though I shredded my own cheese. 03 of 13 Photo by  jaela03 06/20/2020 04 of 13 Photo by  jaela03 06/20/2020 05 of 13 Photo by  Karmin 04/22/2019 I followed other comment suggestions -doubled cheese and added garlic & paprika, baked at 350 for 40 min. So much easier than making an roux. I also added ham left over from Easter dinner for a one-pot meal (served with salad on the side). Definitely a keeper for my family of 7! 06 of 13 Photo by  Mrs Perks 02/15/2019 I like the recipe and I followed it exactly. It just was not flavorful enough. So the next time I make it I’ll have to make substitutions. 07 of 13 Photo by  Tydon Aiu 03/20/2018 08 of 13 Photo by  Alexis Bernal 01/06/2018 09 of 13 Photo by  sierrasymone 01/07/2015 10 of 13 Photo by  Keeley 10/20/2014 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Baked Mac and Cheese for One 322 Ratings Wisconsin Five-Cheese Bake 211 Ratings 3-Cheese Pasta Bake 218 Ratings Mom's Baked Macaroni and Cheese 484 Ratings Macaroni and Cheese 428 Ratings Southern Macaroni and Cheese Pie 298 Ratings Cafeteria Macaroni and Cheese 297 Ratings Mom's Favorite Baked Mac and Cheese 1,167 Ratings Velveeta Down-Home Macaroni and Cheese 200 Ratings Home Style Macaroni and Cheese 762 Ratings Quick Macaroni and Cheese 6 Ratings Classic Macaroni and Cheese 428 Ratings Easy Gluten-Free Macaroni and Cheese 57 Ratings Home-Style Macaroni and Cheese 270 Ratings 'Got Some Crust' Macaroni and Cheese 109 Ratings Easiest Homestyle Macaroni and Cheese 40 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Sue Bennett
instructions: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain.;Mix together condensed soup and cheese. Using the empty soup can, measure 1 can of milk; mix into the soup mixture. Stir in cooked pasta. Dump into a greased casserole dish, and cover.;Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) until hot and bubbly, about 30 minutes.
